content: christmas mermaid marella in the deep ocean swam christmas mermaid marella her tail fin shimmering with red scales and her hair sparkling every christmas eve she brought glowing shells to the bottom of the sea decorated coral trees with pearls and sang enchanting songs that brought peace to all seven seas her magic brought joy to the ocean shining as brightly as the stars above alexa boonstra amilishly /people/amilishly
